body.p: Book review: James Pettifer and Miranda Vickers, The Albanian Question: Reshaping the Balkans, New York, I.B. Tauris, 2009; 312 pp; £12.99; ISBN: 9781848850958 by Rita Augestad Knudsen, Journal of Contemporary History 47(3) July 2012, pp. 685-687 [DOI: 10.1177/0022009412440542] is corrected as follows:
P. 687 ran, ‘It is curious that Vickers claims authorship for this argument, when in reality it comes directly from a 2004 ICG report’.

It has subsequently been pointed out to the Reviews Editors by Dr Vickers that she was the author of the 2004 IGE report and was therefore drawing on her own work. The report itself does not credit any author. It is available at http://www.crisisgroup.org/∼/media/Files/europe/153%20Pan-Albanianism%20How%20Big%20-%20amended.pdf (accessed 21 May 2013).
